description: CarX Drift Racing Online is your chance to immerse yourself in the real world of drifting. Get together with friends, tune your car and burn some tires
Touge grip racing team dominating mountain passes in CarX Drift Racing since 2018. 'Fill'er up. High octane'
The mod that has become popular for it's lighting and livery sharing features. Still in active development with more things getting added
We started as an idea in 2018, were born as a team early 2019, and have now grown to be one of the bigger racing communities on CarX
Elite Tire Killers (ETK) is a Race and Drifting team, spanning from CarX to Forza Motorsport and beyond!
